title: Bunny License
info: The Bunny License is a consumable item that can be purchased from the Zoologist for 5 after filling out 45% of the Bestiary. Using it will allow the Town Bunny to move into town. The Town Bunny will move into town at 4:30 AM the next day if there is a house open. It can only be used once per world and the Zoologist will not sell more than one in the world.
stat:
Use time45 (Very slow)
TooltipUse to let a bunny arrive in town
Rarity02*
Buy5
Sell1
